ALERT
You are about to move the subscriber from {{if(options.externalData && options.externalData.payload && options.externalData.payload.sourceBillingAccountNumber)}}{{externalData.payload.sourceBillingAccountNumber}}{{/if}} to {{if(options.externalData && options.externalData.payload && options.externalData.payload.targetBillingAccountNumber)}}{{externalData.payload.targetBillingAccountNumber}}{{/if}} for an amount of ${{if(options.externalData && options.externalData.payload && options.externalData.payload.hasOwnProperty('totalDue'))}}{{externalData.payload.totalDue}}{{/if}}.
This could change/drop the existing promotion on the source account/subscriber.
If you would like to continue, please select {{if(options.externalData && options.externalData.payload && options.externalData.payload.totalDue > 0)}}MAKE A PAYMENT{{#else}}{{if(options.externalData && options.externalData.payload && options.externalData.payload.totalDue === 0)}}MOVE SUBSCRIBER{{/if}}{{/if}}. If not, select CANCEL.
